statements: SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE harvest_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, harvest_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC, harvest_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yields;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Yields WHERE yield_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yields ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT practice_name, practice_description FROM Agricultural_Practices;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM Crop_Yields WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yields WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yields WHERE yield_amount > 1000 AND yield_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY yield_date ASC
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM Crop_Yields GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_yield DESC
SELECT crop_name, yield_date, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM Crop_Yields GROUP BY crop_name, yield_date HAVING avg_yield > 500
SELECT cp.crop_name, ap.practice_name FROM Crop_Yields AS cp JOIN Agricultural_Practices AS ap ON cp.crop_name = ap.practice_name
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, year FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region = 'Midwest';
SELECT field_id, crop_name, yield_amount, year FROM field_data JOIN crop_yield_data ON field_data.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices WHERE practice_id = 3;
SELECT field_id, practice_name, description FROM field_data JOIN sustainability_practices ON field_data.practice_id = sustainability_practices.practice_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region = 'Midwest' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC, year DESC;
SELECT crop_name, MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name;

SELECT field_id, crop_name, practice_name, yield_amount FROM field_data JOIN crop_yield_data ON field_data.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id JOIN sustainability_practices ON field_data.practice_id = sustainability_practices.practice_id WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name, region FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region IN ('Midwest', 'South') ORDER BY region, crop_name;
SELECT AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield, year FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY year ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropData;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM CropData ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT harvest_date, crop_name FROM CropData WHERE harvest_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldData WHERE size > 100;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_info FROM FarmerData ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM CropData WHERE harvest_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FarmerData ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, harvest_date FROM CropData JOIN FieldData ON CropData.crop_id = FieldData.field_id WHERE FieldData.size > 50;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_info FROM FarmerData WHERE farmer_id IN (SELECT farmer_id FROM FarmData WHERE location = 'California');
SELECT farm_name, location FROM FarmData WHERE farm_name LIKE 'Farm%' ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yield;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, yield_value FROM Crop_Yield ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_id FROM Field WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT farmer_name FROM Farmer WHERE farmer_id = 2;
SELECT crop_name, yield_value FROM Crop_Yield WHERE yield_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Yield ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT field_name, farmer_name FROM Field JOIN Farmer ON Field.field_id = Farmer.farmer_id;
SELECT practice_id, practice_name FROM Agricultural_Practices WHERE practice_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT crop_name, yield_value FROM Crop_Yield WHERE yield_value > 50 ORDER BY yield_value ASC;
SELECT crop_name, field_name, farmer_name FROM Crop_Yield JOIN Field ON Crop_Yield.crop_id = Field.field_id JOIN Farmer ON Field.field_id = Farmer.farmer_id ORDER BY crop_name ASC, field_name DESC;
